nodes.text: 1/2\nHistorybook: Hiram Revels becomes first African American in US Congress (1870); Beatles guitarist George Harrison born (1943);
2/2\nMuhammad Ali, then known as Cassius Clay, defeats Sonny Liston to win his first world heavyweight title (1964); HBD actress Téa Leoni (1966); RIP playwright and poet Tennessee Williams (1983).
